title: Why is the PBE sign up page down?
body: Probably a stupid question but I just really started playing again and wanted to get back into the PBE but the link as to where to sign up is down. Any response is nice. Thanks!

replies.body: Can you tell me how it's "down"? I can access it just fine, so I'm not sure what error message or issue you're seeing with the page.

https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe

this link wonk show anything besides a error 505 with bliz saying something has gone wrong. thats all no link to fix it or nothing

I am having the same problem. I reloaded a couple of times and it's still not working. Keeps showing a picture of iBlitz with error thing in middle. Says Error: 500
Something has gone hextechincally wrong.
